page.title: 12INDUSTRY -METAL MANUFACTURER
page.content:
Porter's of Calthwaite is a local employer of men experienced in the manufacture of items constructed of steels and other metals. Originally the business served the needs of the farming community, with such items as fittings for milking parlours, cages for stock, gates, etc.
Expansion into manufacture for a wide range of needs has taken place, and now some 12 people are employed at the works. Pallets of various types are made from angle, tube or hollow section steel, with a variety of combinations using mesh, plate and timber.
Porter's have recently begun to export some of their products from the country.
